ComicInfo.Title: Horror Business, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Horror Business: Part 1
Part 1 of 5! Two unemployed, municipal animal control specialists discover Cleveland is lousy with monsters. Underpaid, under-budgeted, and in way over their heads they take it upon themselves to stop a plot to turn Cleveland's citizens into werewolves.
Plot
The Pound is a horror comedy about two animal control specialists, Scottie Allison and Howie Lynch, who lost their jobs due to budget cuts. Without jobs but not without initiative, they decide to open their own animal capture and rehab company - THE POUND.
Everything is business as usual for the first couple of weeks, but all of that changed the night they receive a call about a large dog roaming the halls of a local high school. Soon, Scottie and Howie find themselves in a world of werewolves and other monsters living in Cleveland.
Release Info
The first issue - Horror Business - is available for free download on the publisher's website. For the follow-up story - Ghouls Night Out (1-4) - the creators turned The Pound into a Kickstarter project to raise sufficient funds from the fans.
Ghouls Night Out #1 was eventually released on September 2012.
